name: Veterinary Hospital of Dr. Lauralyn J. Brown Reviews

review.title: “Compassionate employees and reasonable prices”
review.pros: Pros – The Vet and assistants truly love and care about what they do so you know you you are always getting quality care for your pet.
review.cons: Cons – Outdated facility, lacking in space
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Relax sometime
